rows: Seeding method. The default method edaSeedUniform generates the values of each variable in the initial population from a continuous uniform distribution.
Local optimization method. The use of a local optimization method is disabled by default.
Selection method. The default method edaSelectTruncation implements truncation selection.
Replacement method. The default method edaReplaceComplete completely replaces the current population with the new population.
Reporting method. Reporting progress information is disabled by default.
Termination method. The default method edaTerminateMaxGen ends the execution of the algorithm after a maximum number of generations.
Lower bounds of the variables of the objective function.
Upper bounds of the variables of the objective function.
Total number of evaluations of the objective function.
Run time of the algorithm in seconds.

tables.table_title: Summary of the results obtained in 30 independent runs of CVEDA and DVEDA for the docking of the $2 \mathrm{z} 5 \mathrm{u}$ test system. Pop. denotes Population.

rows: published by the American Statistical Association
